attributes.action: allow David Tennant to carry the olympic torch in the 2012 Olympics wearing a Doctor Who outfit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Tennant played a brilliant role as Dr Who in an episode last year in which he was seen carrying the Olympic torch to Wembley.  For the sake of the timeline (and the fabric of the Universe) we humbly and respectfully petition the Prime Minister to please join in with the fun and let David carry the torch for Dr Who fans everywhere.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
